start: Hello. To get info you should write /help
help: 1) Don't write command cd with other commands in 1 querry 2) If you write command which depends from path where it executes - add %PATH%. Example: ls %PATH% 3) Don't write %PATH% when you need to change your directory. Example: Bad: cd %PATH%../dirName Good: cd ../dirName 4) You can't write \ in cd request, only /
